thread.title: Re: Rep. Nancy Pelosi, questioned by mother who lost her son to illegal immigrant, defends sanctuary cities
thread.title_full: Re: Rep. Nancy Pelosi, questioned by mother who lost her son to illegal immigrant, defends sanctuary cities

author: SouthTexas
title: Re: Rep. Nancy Pelosi, questioned by mother who lost her son to illegal immigrant, defends sanctuary cities
text:
Rep. Nancy Pelosi, questioned by mother who lost her son to illegal immigrant, defends sanctuary cities Posted at 10:46 pm on January 31, 2017 by William A. 
Congresswoman Nancy Pelosi appeared on CNN Tuesday night for a town hall appearance, where she claimed that sanctuary city policies make Americans safer: Pelosi: Sanctuary city policies make us safer https://t.co/7ipIk7LRpV #PelosiTownHall https://t.co/boSg5ZB0Rr 
— CNN Politics (@CNNPolitics) February 1, 2017 
That was news to a mother who lost her son to an illegal immigrant: Pelosi speaks with the mother of a child killed by an undocumented immigrant https://t.co/7ipIk7LRpV #PelosiTownHall https://t.co/7rlM17GZbZ 
— CNN Politics (@CNNPolitics) February 1, 2017 Nancy Pelosi: "The issue of late-term abortion is one that has been used by the far right" #PelosiTownHall https://t.co/dLltRKmLHA 
Pelosi also championed Obamacare, explaining that it had succeeded in every way. Nancy Pelosi: The Affordable Care Act "has succeeded in every way" https://t.co/Z7Qhr4A5YQ #PelosiTownHall https://t.co/Kl3wUuCJmR 
— CNN (@CNN) February 1, 2017 
President Donald Trump, who had announced his pick for Supreme Court just an hour earlier, was very much on her mind. Pelosi: "President Trump found out about our town hall meeting and thought he would upstage us" #PelosiTownHall https://t.co/Ii7RhDqpD1
